about_the_game:
Hello, you, random passerby! Come come.

  • Soak and pickle yourself in this album of over 34 glam and dreamy ORIGINAL TRACKS from the Secret Life of Dorian Pink.
  • CONCEPT ART and NOTES and scribbles snatched fresh from the developer's journal accompany you on sensory journey to the glistening Hellscape!
  • And of course, this is on the house—the LYRICS to the most popular pop song in Hell, THE AY SONG!

A bargain for the discerning eye. Come come, before the hot goods run out!
